Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks to the effort you and the other farmers
have put forth, we have more countries coming
to trade with us. I wanted to convey my thanks.
<PAGE>
Since we have more tourists coming to visit
now, we'd like to put you in charge of another
Area Edit...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you! Now, allow me to show you the new
area.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You have been given Area Editing rights to this
new area right here...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I leave things in your capable hands,
<MYNAME>.
